metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1590 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The forum list in Drupal 7.x before 7.14 does not properly check user permissions for unpublished forum posts, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information such as the post title via the forum overview page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1590` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
